item.title: MFont.net
item.description: MF-Net: A Novel Few-shot Stylized Multilingual Font Generation Method GitHub Repo: iamyufan/MF-Net Paper presented at the 30th ACM International Conference on Multimedia (MM ‘22) Authors: Yufan Zhang, Junkai Man, Peng Sun* Introduction Designing fonts is never a simple task, especially when it comes to non-Latin languages like Chinese, which have intricate glyph patterns and a high number of characters. Furthermore, in the real world, creating a multilingual font poses an even greater challenge, requiring years of research, expertise in using numerous professional tools, and collaboration among multiple font designers specializing in various languages.

item.title: Blockchain Network Analysis
item.description: Paper presented at SAI Computing Conference 2023 Authors: Yufan Zhang, Zichao Chen, Yutong Sun, Yulin Liu*, and Luyao Zhang* Introduction Decentralized finance (DeFi) is known for its unique mechanism design, which applies smart contracts to facilitate peer-to-peer transactions. The decentralized bank is a typical DeFi application. Ideally, a decentralized bank should be decentralized in the transaction. However, many recent studies have found that decentralized banks have not achieved a significant degree of decentralization.
